/**
 * 该文件用于汇总所有的reducer为一个总的reducer
 */ //引入combineReducer， 用于整合多个reducer
import{combineReducers}from'redux';//引入为Count组件服务的reducer
import count from'./count';//引入为Person组件服务的reducer
import persons from'./person';//汇总所有的reducer变为一个总的reducer
export default combineReducers({count:count,persons:persons});
